thread.title: Suriya visits temple ahead of starting 'Suriya 44' shoot
thread.title_full: Suriya visits temple ahead of starting 'Suriya 44' shoot

author: VNExplorer
title: Suriya visits temple ahead of starting 'Suriya 44' shoot
text: Suriya visits temple ahead of starting 'Suriya 44' shoot Actor Suriya has officially signed up for his next 'Suriya 44' with director Karthik Subbaraj, The actor will soon start shooting for the film as the makers took to social media couple of days back to show that the pre-production work has been completed and the grounds are ready for the film shooting in Andaman Nicobar islands. With the news that the actor will soon leave for his movie shooting, prior to that the actor was spotted in a temple as he sought blessings from god. In a new photo that is making rounds on social media, Suriya was spotted donned in a white dhoti and white shirt as he prayed to the deities in a temple. The actor before beginning his work schedule for 'Suriya 44' visited the temple. The film is said to star Uriyadi Vijay Kumar as the antagonist, and Pooja Hegde is said to play the female lead. Actors Jayaram and Joju George are playing crucial roles in the film. An official confirmation on the cast of the film is awaited. On the work front, Suriya is awaiting the release of his film 'Kanguva' directed by Siva. The movie is a period action drama starring Suriya, Disha Patani, Bobby Deol and DOP Nataraj.The music for it is composed by Devi Sri Prasad and it is currently in post-production and the movie is expected to release by this year. The actor also has 'Suriya 43' with Sudha Kongara and 'Vaadivaasal' with Vetrimaaran in his project pipeline which have been delayed. but will soon go on floors. For more news like this visit TOI.
